website_summaries.verdict: Shaping jeans from Levi's that flatten the belly and lift the rear.
pros: Decent price for a shaping jean
cons: Fabric varies somewhat based on color choice
Owners should note this before washing

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'm 57years old, gained weight but always been fashion super alert... this the best fitting jeans, best looking jeans I had in my life.. and I had it all.. from 400$ ones and all. Colour is very stylish (dark blue) and can be dressed up or down. I took them to a 4 day trip as soon as it arrived, wore it 4 days and it didn't change shape or became soggy... or loose! Also, important to know is that these jeans does make your stomach in 2 balloons, rather nice all in fit without looking old fashion. I will buy all colours there are!
customer_reviews.author: Kosmopolit

customer_reviews.title: Slimming.
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a size 28 but due to weight gain (now a size 8-10, 5'6"), I ordered the 29/Short. I have regular inseam but I like an ankle length however, this pair felt like it was tapered and hemmed just for me - it was the perfect length. I love the waist line - it is not low rise and can hide some rolls of love handles out of site. It also has a "lifting" effect on the butt area which is a plus!!! Fit is perfect, color is perfect for slimmed down look.
customer_reviews.author: Mixknickknacks

customer_reviews.title: Great skinny jeans
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of 311's. I love them! I wear an 8-10 and the 30x32 is perfect. I maybe could have gone with 29x32 but I figure they'll tighten up a bit after they are washed. I like that the waist is not too low. I am over 50 and don't want "mom jeans" but don't want a muffin top either.
customer_reviews.author: Cimarron Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Check for authenticity thoroughly before removing tags
customer_reviews.text: These are knock offs! I took the tags off so I cant return them now, but I realized when I was folding them yo put away in my drawer. I'm not an expert, but the red tag on side if pocket doesn't even say Levi's. Then as I look further into the detail, I realized the tags were placed different than ALL my other Levi's. The stitching is already starting to fray, the tag on left at waist is totally a different quality also. I'm convinced that one of my two pairs I ordered, is definitely not an authentic Levi's brand jeans. Super disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Best jeans ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love Levi's jeans! I usually buy them from our local outlet store but found them on sale here and couldtpass it up. The 311 fit is perfect for me! I am curvy and it fits perfectly in all the right places. I wear a size 8-10 jean and ordered a 29. Love this fit! I even recommended to a friend and she also said she loves Levi’s 311 jeans. Makes jean shopping easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Boland

customer_reviews.title: I love these levis!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 14. I ordered a 16 and they fit great! I weigh 195 ,I'm 5'3 with a big butt and small waist. Very hourglass like. These jeans are so cute. I'm going to buy more. If you don't have a big butt I don't recommend ordering up,unless you have a big tummy. My stomach is flat but I ordered up a size due to my healthy behind.
customer_reviews.author: sandra hammond

customer_reviews.title: WHERE DID MY MUFFIN TOP GO?
customer_reviews.text: I'm 35 and have had a child. I am now struggle with finding jeans that look flattering are most importantly comfortable and look stylish. I wasnt sure about these and then I tried them on and they are perfect. They are slimming and hold in your tummy and go high enough to cover the dreaded muffin top but they aren't full blown mom jeans. I am 5'4 and I got the short, they come right to my ankle and are perfect for wearing ankle boots. They come in alot of different colors too. I would recommend trying these, this is the only style of Levi's that I like.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I have very skinny legs. Skinny jeans always leave bulges in the legs....but not these. They fit beautifully. The stretch is comfortable. They give my 50+ year old rear end good shape and they retain their shape. The rise is higher, so it helps with my muffin top. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: girlfriend 11

customer_reviews.title: Curvy girls need these!
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna buy these directly from Levi's site, but with shipping it would have cost more. These fit my curvy 5'8" 200 lb small waist big butt and ginormous thighs PERFECTLY. Like... seriously they fit as though they were custom made to my measurements and the elastic/stretch recovery in the butt (I sit in a chair for work) is pretty good. After 10 hours there's a little too much flex in the seat but after washing, they're right back to where they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a perfect pair of jeans!!
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are amazing!! Finally after 36 years I have found a pair of jeans that fit me perfectly. I have a small waist and in the past If I find jeans that fit my thighs and hips, the waist gaps. These fit my curves perfectly. Not only that but the denim does not stretch out as I wear them, so I never have to wash them just to get the fit right again. My butt flattened out after pregnancy, it’s slowly rounding out again and these jeans accentuate it perfectly. Finally feeling sexy again! Can’t say enough good things about these jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Love these Levi’s!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit tight but not too tight and really give you a good shape especially in the booty area. They are not as high waisted as my Levi’s 721 or the Levi’s wedgie jean but they are still high waisted. I feel like the picture on amazon shows them a little shorter than they really are. I am 5 4” 120 lbs and I got a size 25. They are definitely long enough to wear with flats with still a little bunch at the ankle. And they only cost $15!! I’ve been looking at these for awhile because I love Levi’s and when they went that low on the price I couldn’t resist! Will definitely buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Great Slimmimg Skinny Jeans!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite jeans! I am 5'4" 130lbs and usually wear a size 27/4 in Levi's. That's what I purchased in these and they fit great! They hold their shape and don't end up baggy at the end of the day. I have athletic thighs so I'm always nervous about skinny jeans. These are VERY slimming!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: New faves!
customer_reviews.text: Jeans are hard! Am I right? These are perfect thought! I’m 5’2 135lbs wearing the 28. (Normally a 4/6 in bottoms) I sized up from my normal 27 but I DO NOT think you need to. They have a good amount of stretch to them. They are definitely long on me, but I’m use to that. Definitely recommend giving these a try. @xosimplylo for more amazon finds
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Fuquay

customer_reviews.title: My favorite skinny Levi's, tummy control rocks
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several pairs of Levi's 311 Jean's and they always fit well. The rise is perfect, with enough shaping in the tummy area to make a difference but not too matronly at all. The skinny fit is stylish without being too confining. I've tried the 711, but the waist isn't as secure as the 311, I just feel more confident in the 311 Jean, no tugging them up or even thinking about the fit. I wore a pair on a long flight a few days ago and they were comfortable, the amount of stretch is perfect. Indigo canvas is a great wash, not too dark, not too light, very nice denim.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size
customer_reviews.text: Levi's shaping jeans have become my favorite. I have a few pairs of the 314 but they don't seem to make them anymore so I decided to try the 311 even though I prefer a straight-leg jean. I usually have to go up one size in Levi's and did the same for these jeans. The fit is slim and smooth without being tight. They stretch nicely without becoming baggy. Recommended if you are looking for a nice black jean.
customer_reviews.author: njmom225

customer_reviews.title: My unicorn jeans....
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit...super comfortable and moves with you. I like that it is not tight at the waist so it doesn't look like I have a muffin top. I have slimmer legs compared to my waist, normal size in most pants is 14 (Lucky jeans, Tablots, Ovis) these I can wear a 12. I previously had a 14 in the same 311 style...lost some lbs. So needed a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: OctoberSun

customer_reviews.title: Best Levi's Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Levis an these 311's really do the higher waist right!! I bought them in 32 length because I am taller an did not want ankle jeans. The fit is sexy an the smaller back pockets do justice to your butt! Of course I've been wearing Levis my whole life! The fit on me is great. I also wear 711's, Boyfriend and still Love the super low 524's! Levis are the best an these are the REAL thing.
customer_reviews.author: irishtoast

customer_reviews.title: Fit like jeans vs ”jeggings”. I found the 711’s to be more like jeggings than jeans.
customer_reviews.text: This is account is in my hubby’s name - Just got these jeans and I’m a fan! 5’6.5” and 145-150 athletic build. The are slim fitting yet have a sturdy stretch, without looking like I’m wearing jeggings. I don’t like when my jeans look like athletic stretch leggings...I have muscular and shapely calves, and like it when the opening of the jeans aren’t so narrow that they look like athletic pants. These are perfect...size 29 and look cute with booties and heals and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for me
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are not bad, good fit, a little too long but not bad, I just didn’t keep them because the distress in the jeans that are supposed to be on the knees well on me they were much lower than my knees and it wasn’t a good look to me lol so I sent them back, I’m 5’6 but have a longer torso and shorter legs so that Is probably why. So if you have longer legs then it would look better. That being said these are good quality and make and fit is true to size ( I am 5’6 and 210lbs and size 16 were perfect)
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shopp

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and
customer_reviews.text: My fave jeans after years of searching. I’m short and thick 5’3 and 175# with big curves. So comfortable and flattering
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for embroidery on white jeans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in white. The fit is almost perfect but just a little loose in the back waistband. I am kind of between a 28 and a 29, and I went with a 29. I was a little disappointed that the white jeans have embroidery down the side, but now that I’m looking for it I can see it in the pictures. I’m keeping them anyway because they fit well amd aren’t see-through like a lot of white jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are Awesome!! They fit tts in my opinion be maybe a tad big but pretty perfect not at all tight and I love the way the look on my button and waist line look slim. They are more of a mid rise I am use to only low rise below belly button but the mid rise rally make body look nice and I like that the ankles aren't skin tight. Great jeans, I will be buying another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Beware of trying to order the 32L(long) option!
customer_reviews.text: I chose the 26x32L option and submitted my order. I did not double check my cart to see that it had made it in there correctly. When they arrived, I received a 26R. I thought maybe I had done something wrong, so tried reordering, but this time checking my cart to see what the description was. Sure enough, it happened again. If you choose a L(ong) option, it will automatically be converted to a R(egular) length, which is 30", in your cart. Disappointing! The fit in the rest of the jean was good, but I have returned them because they are too short for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Color
customer_reviews.text: I got Maui Glow and it’s the perfect blue, I don’t like whiskering, distressing or faded area on the thighs and these are perfect, I am 5’5 120 with a straight shape and the W27fit perfectly, skinny but not super skinny Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but WHAT IS THAT SMELL?!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and sturdy quality jean but WHAT IS THAT SMELL?! I have washed these 3 times now and used fabric freshener beads and softener sheets and can't get the chemical smell to go away. Disappointed because I love how these fit and feel on. They just smell awful znd my husband could smell them just sitting next to me after I washed them.
customer_reviews.author: MelCam

customer_reviews.title: Holds shape and does not get baggy
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Not too low and not full high rise either, just right. I’m a 12 in pants and am 5’7 so I got the 30 with 28 length as these run long and I wanted them to stop at the top of my ankle. Fits amazing. Has great tummy control for the muffin top area. Does not stretch out like other stretchy jeans. Wore them 5 times without ever having them get baggy. Very good hold. They feel tight when you first get them on but ten minutes later they loosen up just enough. Beware, the darker colors fit soo much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: C_AK

customer_reviews.title: These are a very comfortable and flattering fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6", 135 lb, with short legs and a long torso. The 29 waist 30 long fit me perfectly. These are a very comfortable and flattering fit. The waist is a little high which is very good at hiding a little belly flab and maintains good coverage even when sitting on the ground or squatting.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early, Fit great, look amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Just purchased a second pair in darker blue. I should add that I wear several sizes smaller than the suggested size. I purchased the 30-32 and could have worn one size smaller, the 8. But all jeans are a little loose in my waist. I haven’t checked to see if they shrink yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shop2much

customer_reviews.title: New favorite jeans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants. I lived in a pair of Levi's that I guess are no longer made so I ended up looking at these. I bought the olive and loved them so much I went back for the burgundy color. Here's the weird thing though--the burgundy feels like an entire size smaller than the olive color from the waist through the leg. I'm just gonna have to be careful when I wash them. These look nice enough to wear to work at my business casual job. I am 5'10" and the length (regular) hits just above the ankle--not too high not too low.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schey

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I think this will be my new "go to" jeans. Just the right amount of softness and stretch. I am 5' 7" and weigh 134 pounds, curvey through the hips. The size 8/29 fits very well. I also like that the rise is high enough that it doesn't create a "muffin top", but not so high as to look like "mom jeans".
customer_reviews.author: Val from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these pants. It took me 2 orders to get my Levi's size just right but these fit like a glove and look great. 2 days wear doesn't stretch them out too much, which is one problem I always have with skinny jeans. The higher waist is great, 10 years ago me would have scoffed at high wasted but now at 32 I like the comfort of shape wear.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Ann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I can not mention enough how much I love these jeans. So much that I went back and bought four more pair. Due to me being a runner and body builder, I have a hard time finding jeans that fit well and comfortable in both my thighs and waist. These fit perfect. I am 5'5", 136lbs. I ordered size 27 and they fit in the waist, thigh and but as if they were tailored to me. They are also perfect for short and high boots, flats and kicks.
customer_reviews.author: PennPunn

customer_reviews.title: Levis a must!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jeans.. They make a great butt. Also I have a problem with Jean fabric at times. I have very sensitive skin and some jeans make me itch... I can't wear the cheaper Walmart levis version only these. No problem at all. Super comfortable and the price is right too.! I think I bought like 3 pairs for myself and one pair for my friend.. She calls them her dating jeans lol because they make such a great butt... Lol
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Longer than other washes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of 311 Shaping Skinny. I bought one with the normal denim wash and they fit amazing, so I decided to purchase a second pair in this lighter wash. These ones are much tighter and longer. I have to cuff them at my ankles. Not bad enough to send back though. My first pair I've even been wearing during quarantine because they are so comfortable...these light wash ones are still folder in the drawer for the past month.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Super stretchy and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans. They're a bit too big due to the stretch though. I've ordered a size smaller and will be returning these. The short is the perfect length for me. The waist is not as cinched as two of the other styles I tried, which allows me to get a smaller size that will fit my legs and booty better without squishing my belly and suffocating me. The rise is perfect to hold in my belly without being too high. I am 5'2", 126 lbs, carry my weight in my belly and have a mom belly shape due to having a child, skinny legs, and barely any booty for reference.
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: Excited to replace a favorite pair of Levi’s
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty long complicated relationship with Levi shaping plus jeans lol I’ve been buying them since 2015 The fit... if it has more cotton % you may need to up the size. 81% cotton is a size up for me. 62% would be my regular size. This pair is exactly what I expected! It’s a replacement of a favorite pair that worn out. Fits great, color is what I wanted. I got them on amazon for a good price. I wear mostly shaping straight, but really like this exact color. So tried the skinny and really liked them! I prefer Levi’s with 81% cotton like this one, and glad that they at least give me one to choose!
customer_reviews.author: deependgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Mid-Rise, Hem is Longer than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fit- higher rise than I normally wear, but comfortable and slimming. The leg is still skinny but not as tight as 711 (I have muscular legs). My only complaint is that the hem is very long. I typically wear a 29/30 inch hem, but these must be at least 32 inches. I’m not sure if I will keep these, or try to return them for the shorter hem. Levi’s hems don’t seem to be true to what they advertise— they run long!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Halligan

customer_reviews.title: No. Only buy if you enjoy feeling like a sausage.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Bought my normal size That I wear in all brands - Calvin, J Crew, Gap, Kut from the Cloth - I’m the SAME SIZE. I’m very consistent. But these Levis 311 in my size fit *so* snuggly that I feel like I’m wearing a compression stocking from my ankles to my belly button and can’t breathe. Awful. They never give in or relax like other stretch denim. I knew I was doomed when I couldn’t get the ankle opening over my foot. Going back!!
customer_reviews.author: LongTallSally

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Generally, I like them as a comfy jean for getting stuff done. Fairly true to size and has some stretch (not pure demin.) Petite/Short length is AMAZING for shorter people. The pants hit as the perfect spot on my ankle - no rolling up needed!!! I am an hourglass/pear shape so I have more curve on my lower half with a smaller waist. The butt and thigh areas don't have as much room as I would hope. It's fairly flattering, but does squish the booty a bit. Going up one size might help? I also wish it was higher waisted - it hit my below my belly button. Thankfully it's not uncomfortable when I sit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Elavsky

customer_reviews.title: These Jean Are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: They fit snug, but they have stretch, so its ok! They are TTS. They fit my curvy booty and small waist like a glove. I love how high they come. Great length. For size reference, I'm 5'3", 139 with a true hourglass figure. Wide hips and a significantly smaller waist. These are the most flattering jeans I've ever worn. I've never looked leaner! Size 29x28 were PERFECT. EDIT: I also ordered 29x30 and the fit was AWFUL! So petite girls, order your length. Take advantage of a brand that offers options for our little stature. :)
customer_reviews.author: Spades

customer_reviews.title: Droopy butt pockets BAD!
customer_reviews.text: Two things that were the reasons for the low rating: 1. I absolutely detest the droopy butt location of the pockets; they sit way too low and make you look like your but has fallen. 2. The color was way darker than in the photo. If it weren’t four these two major flaws, the jeans were perfectly fine. However, I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: AIR DANCER

customer_reviews.title: Fake Levi’s
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been seeing people saw fake Levi’s and I debated back and forth on getting these. I purchased the Hawaii polka dot and everything was perfect, until today ! These are fake Levi’s. California Haze is not real Levi’s . I request 31R (12R) got a 12S which is marked incorrectly , at best it’s a size 8 or 10. Amazon really should be ashamed of themselves allowing this to continue , will never purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Lamia K.

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans will order again
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1 and 135pounds. I knew they would be to long. I love everything about them I do have to wear a belt with them so think I could have gone down a size. I will order again. I do not like my pants to tight. Fit in the hips. If it will help my waist is 33 and hips 40. So hope this helps. When I buy something from Amazon I read all the reviews. Helps when everyone puts in measurements. Gives a reference for all. Next time I will try a size down cause the waist band has alot of give. Brenda
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Best Jeans I've Ever Worn
customer_reviews.text: 311s have been my go-to jeans for several years now. Just the right amount of sturdy denim feel with super comfortable stretch. I am tall and have a small waist but need lots of room in the hip/thigh area and these fit perfectly. I also love how high the waist is! I love these so much that I have these in four different colors. Definitely wait for them to go on sale, you can shave off 1/3 of the price a few times per year.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: NOT skinny jeans
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed, I've now tried a size 20W and 22W, with both getting returned. The 20W was too small in the waist, but fit ok in the legs. The 22W fit the waist, but the legs and glutes were WAY too big. I wish I read the reviews first, as many people are saying this. The waist is tight, but the rest of the jeans are very bag, and the cut is most definitely not a skinny jean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fit oddly
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about these jeans after reading the reviews but they just weren't for me. I normally wear a size 4 or a 25-26 in waist. I ordered my true size. The crotch of the jeans hung down even though they were snug in the legs, causing that awful popping sound when you walk. The waist fit in the front but gapped in the bag, almost like they had been stretched out. The quality was lower than expected as well. For reference I'm 5'3", 118 lbs, pear shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Betina26

customer_reviews.title: These were my favorite work jeans until....
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 20W I am 5 6' and fluctuate a lot between 250 lbs and 260lbs and honestly these were my absolute favorite work jeans until my last order I received. Every time I ordered these they were perfect before but this time I noticed that the pockets were a lot smaller than the older pairs and the part that covers the zipper isn't big enough to cover the zipper entirely while being worn. Honestly it was really weird. Bought jeans from one of those IG companies and they were better.
customer_reviews.author: fabby

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed/fitting jeans for plus sized women
customer_reviews.text: These are way too stretchy and large/baggy & bunch up in the wrong spots so they are not flattering, and are too long. They hug nowhere, & do not see them holding their shape after any duration of wear. However, I must be fair & say Amazon sent me a pair that was 10 sizes too big, & item description will not show me the size, so if it's over 30, that was the 10+ sizes too big pair. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the hype! The pandemic hasn't been kind to my waistline and the "Quarantine 15" is real. I'm 5'3 and 200lbs and a 16 fit PERFECTLY. No bunching or pinching. I didn't have to struggle to pull them up or suck in my gut. These jeans are my new favorite to get me through life somewhat normalizing and I can get back into my old jeans.
customer_reviews.author: TallyManders

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Great for helping with a Mom belly
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great for helping with a Mom belly. They are also super soft so feel more like a legging than a jean. They do not loose shape after a few hours like so many skinny jeans do!
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Dayna Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Find your style!
customer_reviews.text: I love Levi’s. I usually get mid rise skinny. They are not as “skinny” at the leg as these. I like this style and the olive is so so soft. ... sadly, I have to wear multiple layers some days and squeezing in my lower calves in long underwear just isn’t practical. For dress up or going out in heels, boots.. whatever you can’t go wrong with Levi’s. It’s just a matter of style.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I struggle to find jeans that fit my waist and thighs and these fit like a glove. They are soft with a little stretch and I don’t have to hike them up all day long. Finally I found jeans for my small but curvy figure! For reference, I’m 5’3”, 130 lbs and the 27 short are perfect. I loved them so much I recommended to my mom and she loves them too! Size 28, 5’5”, 145lb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving the fit of the 311 jeans!
customer_reviews.text: 311 - my new favorite jeans to wear. Great fit - very comfortable. 5'3", 122 lbs - bought size 27
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is they smell like chemicals. I can’t get the smell out and ...
customer_reviews.text: These jeans fit really well. I get a size bigger because Levi’s are always a little small for me. The only problem is they smell like chemicals. I can’t get the smell out and it’s too late for me to return them. I am very disappointed because they fit so well. A epwaste of $50 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D

customer_reviews.title: Good and not so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pairs of the same style jeans in different colors. I already owned a pair of these jeans in a different color than I ordered. One pair fit perfectly, just like the jeans that I already owned. The 2nd pair did not fit correctly or at least not the same. It was a little bigger in the waist and in the legs. The length was the same on all 3 pairs. I will keep the pair that is different, but I would prefer that it had been the same as the others.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cypert

customer_reviews.title: Compared to Levi regular skinny jeans I say similar in size but they fit totally different an in my case tthat's a great thing. I love the higher back side in ...
customer_reviews.text: So, these jeans arrived today. I got 2 pair. I already had a pair from a couple years ago. First off they are sized I'd say atleast a size smaller than the regular Levi straight leg. Compared to Levi regular skinny jeans I say similar in size but they fit totally different an in my case tthat's a great thing. I love the higher back side in this jean. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: These jeans make me feel good!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans! If I could wear them everyday I would. They fit perfect and look great. I’m a mom of 2 and they hold everything in where it belongs lol aka the mom pooch. They make me feel good when I wear em. Do it! They may seem a little snug at first but they stretch so order your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Weird, thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: These jeans fit about as I expected them to. I'm 5'7" about 155 and I got the 30R with the 30" inseam. Weird that when they arrived the label said 30 short, though the inseam was still 30" as I expected. They fit fine. Not quite a high rise, but close. More like a higher mid-rise. However, the fabric felt weird, thin, and cheap. It was kind of...fuzzy...on the inside. I sat down in them for about 15 minutes and when I stood up the knees were bunched up and sticking out. I have a feeling these would lose their shape quickly, and also wear out quickly. They're going back.
customer_reviews.author: rvrgrl74

customer_reviews.title: This style, good quality even with stretch
customer_reviews.text: I like Levi’s because of the thickness of denim used. These jeans have a nice stretch to them, not flimsy. Only thing is I either need to grow a bigger waist or butt because they tend to slide down in the back. I’m an in between size (between an 8-10). Have to pull them up in the back more than I’d like. Guess I’ll have to belt them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and run small
customer_reviews.text: The pants are nice and they color is great. They do fit tighter than a 28 should fit. I have a pair of 27s in the same pants, but blue jeans and they fit better. The main complaint I have though is the material in the waist. The stitching or how they stitched them is horrid. It rubs and cuts into the skin so bad that by the end of the day I have a couple of spots on my skin that are raw. Get at least 1 size up and check the waist to make sure you can handle the material.
customer_reviews.author: JeriA

customer_reviews.title: Best place to find Levi's
customer_reviews.text: I saw comments that these weren't true to the name, but I bought some from the actual outlet and some from here, these are definitely the same as the outlet and much better price, even with the sale thru the holiday, these were a better deal, so I'll stick with getting them here. they were the same fit as the 911 so will just stick with whichever of the two is cheaper. A bit short waisted for my liking, but they'll be fine. I am only 5'0 so they are still a bit long on me, but not bad. I'm happy with them...
customer_reviews.author: Sllongley28

customer_reviews.title: Super stretch and very soft
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I’d be wearing skinny jeans I’m not one that likes tight fitting clothes! However these are absolutely awesome very soft much better than wearing sweatpants lots of stretch but yet hold it shape. PS my husband loves them on me
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Almost feel like legging!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’ and 135lb so I am a bit chubby side. It’s hard for me to find good jeans but this one is WINDERFUL! I ordered 27S...my waist didn’t feel tight at all and actually feels almost like leggings, yet it doesn’t look buggy either! So happy with the purchase and I am getting another color because SHORT jeans are had to find!!
customer_reviews.author: EHW

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9'' and 156 lbs, I ordered size 30 L. I was looking for a good pair of jeans that would hold all the "post-pregnancy" belly in place but didn't have a high waist that makes me look like a giant spider (big belly and skinny legs).. These were perfect. I am buying more colors while they have them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small.
customer_reviews.text: a bit disappointed. Returned these. I was expecting a high waisted jean that would avoid the dreaded muffin top because of a question I asked on this site. Not the case. Now that could be my fault--maybe I should have measured differently. Every pair of Levi's I have is a 12 Long. Just were too small. But if you can get your right size--these were perfect in quality, arrived on time, very nice jeans..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these jeans
customer_reviews.text: Carrying a few extra pounds (in my case 25)? Do yourself a favor and buy these jeans. For $40, they are absolutely slimming and will make you feel great. They have give and yet bring that booty in a bit. I bought them in a few different colors. I am normally a Hudson or 7 jeans girl, but these are perfect until I lose some weight.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Fit poorly.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and these were sagging at the ankle even when I chose the shirt option. I have larger than usual calves so the seam would slide sideways and wouldn’t fit properly. The waist wasn’t my usual size. This was disappointing because I have a pair of Ankle 311s from Mavy’s And they’re my go to jean. Lastly, the darkest color appears black in the photo but it is a true dark denim. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love these 311 jeans. After years of searching these are the only jeans that really fit me. I dont wear other jeans anymore. They loosen eventually.. so i do buy them again about 2-3 times a year. Not all colors have the same fit unfortunately. The regular jean colors/materials fit me perfect (dark/light/medium wash)... however the other colors (black/green/maroon etc) have a different material / shape and they dont fit me well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cicmic

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well-fitting, awesome
customer_reviews.text: These jeans fit amazingly well, even with the extra weight I’ve put on during Covid isolation. They make my belly look flat but my booty still rocks its ladylike curves. Woot. If I ever leave the house again, these are the jeans I’ll be wearing. 😄
customer_reviews.author: juliagee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT - HORRIBLE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the way these jeans fit and look. I'd wear them every day. I get compliments on them. (I am 5'1", 135 and ordered the 6's 28x28) The only thing wrong with them is the smell. I don't know if it is formaldehyde or moth balls or...what? I have washed multiple times, soaked in vinegar - all the tricks I can find and yet they still stink. Which make me worried if I ever wear on a date and instead of smelling sexy, I smell like a morgue. I honestly would buy more if they didn't stink so bad.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Shut the front door! These are AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, jeans that fit me?!? And ordered online?!? I love them. The fit is incredible. They are as comfortable as leggings, but have the structure and style of jeans. I have an athletic build - large thighs and rear but a smaller waist. Usually, if jeans fit me in the waist, they are too tight everywhere else. If they fit everywhere else, they are too loose in the waist. These are perfect!!! The stretchy materials forms to my curves. The wash is beautiful - Wallflower is a just-right shade of light blue without being too light or too dark. I'm buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Klaine

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid old Navy Jean girl because I love the fit of their Rockstar jeans. I am 5'1 and curvy so my body type makes it difficult to find a good fit for me. I typically wear a size 8. I bought a size 8 and these jeans and they are amazing. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lolo7493

customer_reviews.title: Levi's
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans! So great especially for the price. The only issue is they are quite short. I ordered a 10R and they sent size 10 Short, they fit ok but were a bit tight. When I reordered I got size 12R and they fit perfectly except length. I'm 5'10" and am used to pants being short but these are short enough I can really only wear with boots. But still cute and make my butt look good so I'm keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: L&B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT JEANS!
customer_reviews.text: Great black jeans! Form fitted! Very flattering! I have more of an athletic type build, and stretch jeans always slide down a bit. Every time I stand up I pull these up a little bit but I have a little bit of OCD when it comes to jeans and where I like them to sit on my hips. I would definitely buy these again and again!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Curvier ladies than me!
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve read into the reviews a bit more. I like the material, well made jeans, but they’re not suited to my body type. I’m fortunate that standard jeans fit me well- like American eagle. If you need a little extra room for your thighs and middle, these are for you! They’re not a standard fit and were loose in my waist, hips, and thighs but tighter in the calves. Weird fit for me. Good jeans if you’re looking for skinny jeans for curvier ladies
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Long enough for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: At 5.10 and a size 12 no pants EVER fit me right-either they are too big if they are long enough or they are perfect fit but not even close to being long enough. Hallelujiah you can choose a longer size than "average" and for the first time in forever I have a pair of jeans that fit perfect and go to my ankles!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are perfect for me. I ordered a bunch of different jeans on Prime Wardrobe to try out and these fit perfectly in my normal size. The 711 and others also by Levi didn't seem true to size. The same size in the 711's were way too tight. The color is great. The length is perfect. I'm 5'9" and got the long.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what they promised to be!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I’m somewhat biased bc I work in fashion and specially for a denim brand. So Levi’s has always been on my radar but I’ve only now “invested” in a pair. These jeans are amazing and exactly what they promised to be: shaping and comfortable at the same time. They are very comfortable when you sit in the office most of your day, the leg and knee are is soft and not constricting, the waistband is soft and elastic, yet doesn’t bag or slip (I like to wear belts so not sure how it would be without a belt).
customer_reviews.author: Barblin Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: These run tight and small.
customer_reviews.text: These say "tummy slimming" and "shapes through hip and thigh" but they are just straight up skinny everywhere even in the calf area. I am 135 lbs. and 5"10" so I do not tend to be "thicker framed" and these were uncomfortably tight at my calves! They are also 31" long and not 32" as it says for the size (L). I really need 33" - 34". So 32" can barley work but 31" length does not work at all. Long (L) should be a longer than average and 31" is average. This is my second order and the length continues to be inconsistent and not long enough. These will be returned sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: NOT 311s!
customer_reviews.text: This item is listed as Levi's 311 shaping skinny jeans. They are actually Levi's 721 high rise skinny jeans. The item picture for this wash also shows the jeans without a hole in the knee when they do have a hole in the left knee. These are NOT the item listed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Cohoon

customer_reviews.title: Fit great at first then sagged
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these pants. I tried them on and thought they would be a good fit. Washed them and wore them again within an hour of wear they were so loose and baggy I couldn't keep them on. I thought it might be how I was washing them but after wearing a couple of times i realized that the fabric just doesn't hold its shape well and come very loose very quickly. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: You want good jeans? Buy Levi’s.
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and I’m happy I bought them. Knowing that these are supposed to be shaping skinnies, though. I was expecting the ankle to be more snug where these are loose. If you fold them, it’s good, but then they are right above the ankle bone rather than below. Up to you what you like. I’m also 5’1 so these probably sit above the ankle on average height women.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer29109

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are not even close to the picture color. Much darker. I bought them because I already own a dark pair and wanted lighter so they didn’t really work out for me. Otherwise they’re great jeans.
customer_reviews.author: christin

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and don't stretch out
customer_reviews.text: These have the perfect amount of skinny and stretch. They're not skin tight like a legging but still a skinny jean. They have a good rise and don't get all baggy as you wear them. I love the grey color just wish they were in long like some of the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: SLP Girl

customer_reviews.title: Thin Material and sizes are not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of 311 and 711. I am 5’3” and 154 lbs. I ordered a 30x30 in the 711 and 31x30 in the 311. The 711 fit great and the larger 311 were very tight so I returned them. Also the 311 were very thin. I could not shake the idea that these were not genuine Levi’s so I have ordered the 711 in another color directly from Levi’s. I have gotten many fakes off Amazon so I like to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Well made but WAY too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought my size according the to the size chart and in accordance to other Levi jeans in the same size but these are huge even though the size on the tag is what I ordered. They are definitely not skinny jeans. The construction is quality but the cut is terrible. The description claims they are mid rise but they come to my belly button and they are baggy, baggy, baggy. I felt like I was wearing a corduroy sack. Since they are mostly cotton, I hoped to shrink them in the wash but that didn't work so now I'm stuck with a horribly fitting pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Material content not as described
customer_reviews.text: Description reads 81% cotton. The actual care tag reads 60%. I purchased these because I wanted the feel of the old Levi jeans I loved. But these are thin and stretchy --nothing like denim. An accurate statement of its material content would have given me a heads-up. Very disappointing. I returned them. Moving on to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: garden girl

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect pair of plus sized jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Perfect. Perfect. They feel like leggings but are sturdy like jeans, and they look really good on. I am definitely buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Dabney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Cloth shopping is a pain, simply because not all stores have a unified measuring system. I find myself shopping at the boys section in person only because I'm small/petite, but have rather wider hip (being a women) in which girls jeans are absurdly skinny. Thankfully, I was able to find the perfect fit within the first order of Levi's here online. Being able to buy something with such detail/measurement specification is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, pretty comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love Levi's, it is my favorite brand for denim! I wanted some corduroy pants, and this pair were on sale! They fit a bit loose on the waist and thighs and a bit tight on the bottom of my legs, but I have big calves so...that's on me... overall I'm pretty happy with the pants, they are warm, soft and comfortable ...at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Best jeans
customer_reviews.text: I have found my favorite jeans! This is my second pair of 311’s. I am 5’1” 108 lbs and I consider myself thick at the waist. Size 8 short fits perfectly. These jeans have just enough stretch to make them comfortable all day and I have not experienced any type of bagging. I am so happy that Amazon has this style. I have tried other Levi’s styles but this is the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently lost weight but still have a bit of a mom belly and needed new pants. Someone suggested that I order this style from Levi so I gave them a try. I tried them on and loved them so much that I immediately ordered another pair. The fit was PERFECT. I love that they were shaping and helped hold in my mom pooch. I would highly recommend to any other woman that wants great looking jeans that will help shape her body.
customer_reviews.author: Aaronb371

customer_reviews.title: Love Levi jeans
customer_reviews.text: These pants have not been washed yet. Waist is at my belly button, top of hip bone. I am 5’4 1/2” tall so length is below ankle. They are very comfortable. I am between sizes so I went with 22
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, good price, Levis for the win
customer_reviews.text: I usually only buy Levis, and these are a fave of mine. I got them on Prime day, came a day late but fit perfect. I love the grey tone ones and will be getting the dark blue also. When these are on sale they are cheaper then Macys. Levis are super durable and have never gotten a hole. These have just the right amount of stretch to them so they fit well, stay up and don't bunch at all.
customer_reviews.author: girlypantsTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans!! They fit great! I'm 5 feet so they are a bit long but that was expected. Best for someone 5-4 however, love them so much. They are great quality !!
customer_reviews.author: ISpendTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I love Levi's jeans
customer_reviews.text: I love Levi's jeans. For any girl with a more heavy bottom, this is the pants for you! No more gaps between your waist and your buttock, which is a big plus! Really comfortable and sturdy material. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Minero

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My new favorite jeans!! It’s hard to find jeans that are stretchy, thick and fit right all over! These are them!! So good! I ordered the short but they were not quite as short as I like but they are just right, Sitting right at the ankle. I think after being washed 1 or 2 times they will be perfection! So glad I gave these a shot!
customer_reviews.author: That girl

customer_reviews.title: Great post-baby jeans
customer_reviews.text: First off, I hate high-waisted pants. But after having a baby four months ago, I went from a size 4 to a 10 (due to diastasis recti, where your ab muscles separate and you get the dreaded “pooch”). So I thought I’d try anything to not look like I’m still pregnant. These have great stretch and actually fit without being uncomfortable. Will have to get more. Just note, the 10s are 30/30 so if you’re a 32 leg as I am, might want to make sure you’re buying the correct length.
customer_reviews.author: mckeown

customer_reviews.title: It fit exactly right.
customer_reviews.text: As the deal of the day, it was a great price. I don't know how, but it makes my old flat bottom have some shape. In the front, it's not too revealing. The pockets are bigger than the off-brands offer now so that something can actually fit in them. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: ann h.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I know understand that high rise doesn't work for me, I guess I'm short-waisted. These lay perfect on tummy, where have this fit been all my life? I think I owned Levi’s in my high school days like 40 years ago and it's nice to come home again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacyangel

product_meta.title: Levi's Women's 311 Shaping Skinny Jeans
product_meta.description: A timelessly chic jean designed for both style and comfort. Built to contour curves, lengthen legs and celebrate your form. Made with an innovative tummy-slimming panel. Levi's Sculpt with Hypersoft is super-soft for enhanced comfort with supportive stretch.
feature_bullets: Wash And Dry Inside Out With Like Colors, Liquid Detergent Is Recommended
